@public
collection Verse {

    // Will be autogenerated from the front-end using some sort of function.
    id : string; 

    // The title of the verse, max 50 characters.
    title : string;

    // The address of the creator of the verse.
    creator : User;

    // The list of unique users who have liked the verse.
    likes : User[];

}

@public 
collection User {

    // The PublicKey of the connected wallet. 
    id : PublicKey;

    pen_name : string;

    // Max 200 characters 
    bio : string;

}
